Class Balloon

java.lang.Object
  Balloon

public class Balloon
extends java.lang.Object

Describes Balloon objects that can be blown up until they pop. Designed for the Balloon game (assignment later in course) You can make a new balloon (specify the position) expand() will make the balloon a little bigger and then pause briefly. pop() will pop the balloon, turning it grey for a short time, then making it disappear after you have popped

Constructor Summary
Balloon(double x, double y)
          Construct a new Balloon object; parameters specify the center of the balloon Draws the balloon on the screen, and pauses briefly.
 
Method Summary
 void expand()
          Make the balloon larger by a random amount between 10 and 20 units It pauses for a short time after expanding it.
 void pop()
          Pops the balloon: draws it in gray, pauses, then makes it disappear.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Balloon

public Balloon(double x,
               double y)
Construct a new Balloon object; parameters specify the center of the balloon Draws the balloon on the screen, and pauses briefly.

Method Detail

expand

public void expand()
Make the balloon larger by a random amount between 10 and 20 units It pauses for a short time after expanding it.

pop

public void pop()
Pops the balloon: draws it in gray, pauses, then makes it disappear. The balloon cannot be expanded or re-popped after the first time it has popped.
